Four suspects sought in Mattapan shootings

Police are searching for four suspects in shootings that left four people injured just after midnight at a home on Orlando Street in Mattapan, police said. (Globe, 12:46 p.m.)
Memorial Day 2012

President Obama honors fallen troops

At Arlington Cemetery the president remembered those who died defending America, saying the country must strive "to be a nation worthy of your sacrifice." (AP, 1:19 p.m.)
